title: The Beatles Anthology 5. August 1965 to July 1966
creator_credit: Chipps Chipperfield, Apple, EMI/Parlophone, Picture Music International and Geoff Wonfor
brief_description: Included here is a wealth of unseen and forgotten footage. The four are never more musical, confident, fluent or assured but hints of a bad day in Manila bring us up short and it seems that things are about to change Episode 5 starts with the Shea Stadium intro by Ed Sullivan, Meeting Elvis, more tour craziness, musicianship deteriorates, new musical directions, Rubber Soul, Revolver, excerpts from the film Yellow Submarine, home movie footage, Munich, Introduction to LSD, the Beatles talk about promo films, 1966 World Tour, live performances at Budokan. Songs included: Twist And Shout, I Feel Fine, Baby’s In Black, I’m Down, Norwegian Wood take 1, Tomorrow Never Knows take 1, Nowhere Man, Day Tripper promo video, We Can Work It Out promo video, Paperback Writer promo, Rain promo, Rock And Roll Music, Paperback Writer, Yesterday, And Your Bird Can Sing out-take.
